meanings.definition: To remove the hair from (an animal hide)
meanings.sent1: I watched the farmer dehair the sheep before shearing its wool.
meanings.sent2: The groomer used a special tool to dehair the rabbit fur.
meanings.sent3: The cow tried to dehair itself by rubbing against the fence, but it didn't work!
meanings.sent4: The dehairing process transformed the rough hide into a smooth leather material.
meanings.sent5: The dehairing machine hummed as it efficiently stripped the hide of all its hair.

meanings.definition: To remove the hair from (a person's body)
meanings.sent1: She decided to dehair her legs before going to the beach.
meanings.sent2: The spa offers a service to dehair unwanted hair from various body parts.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he needed to dehair his arms to become more aerodynamic for swimming.
meanings.sent4: After dehairing, her skin felt smooth and soft like never before.
meanings.sent5: The process of dehairing can be time-consuming but results in a hair-free body.
